title: How to Make a Sloe Screw Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass or Collins glass with ice.
Pour ¾ ounce of vodka into the glass.
Pour 1½ ounces of sloe into the glass.
Top with orange juice and stir.
Garnish with an orange slice.
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour ½ ounce of sloe gin into the highball glass.
Pour 1 ounce of vodka into the highball glass.
Add 1 ounce of Southern Comfort.
Top with orange juice.

methods.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Up Against the Wall

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour 1 ounce of vodka into the highball glass.
Pour 1 ounce of Southern Comfort into the highball glass.
Add 1 ounce of sloe gin into the highball glass.
Top off with Galliano and orange juice.

methods.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Up Against the Wall Mexican Style

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour ½ ounce of vodka into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of Southern Comfort into the highball glass.
Pour 1½ ounces of sloe gin into the highball glass.
Pour the ½ ounce of tequila into the highball glass.
Add ½ ounce of Galliano into the highball glass.
Top off with orange juice.

methods.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Between the Sheets

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour ½ ounce of vodka into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of Southern Comfort into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of sloe gin into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of rum into the highball glass.
Add ½ ounce of brandy into the highball glass.
Top off with orange juice.

methods.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Up Against the Fuzzy Wall

steps.headline: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour ½ ounce of vodka into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of Southern Comfort into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of sloe gin into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of peach schnapps into the highball glass.
Add ½ ounce of Galliano into the glass.
Top off with orange juice.

methods.name: Long Sloe Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall with Satin Pillows the Hard Way

steps.headline: Fill with highball glass with ice.
Pour ½ ounce of gin into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of sloe gin into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of Southern Comfort into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of peach schnapps into the highball glass.
Pour ½ ounce of Galliano into the highball glass.
Add a splash of orange juice.
Add a splash of Frangelico.
Add a splash of whiskey.
